title: Enchanting Ruby and Diamond Nakshi Haaram
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold Standard) with Hyderabadi Polish
G Color). Metal contains rose gold elements.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a modern geometric interpretation of traditional South Indian jewelry. The necklace features a series of interlocked geometric shapes, each encrusted with brilliant cut diamonds surrounding a triangle cut center. The pendant boasts a large, carved ruby gemstone, adorned with a halo of pave diamonds. The ruby is carved with a floral pattern, a testament to the rich artistic heritage of the region.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and high-end social gatherings. Also suitable for Seemantham and half-saree functions
description: This piece seamlessly blends traditional craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The exceptional brilliance of the diamonds, combined with the rich hue of the ruby, creates a captivating contrast. The intricate craftsmanship, including the pave diamond setting and detailed ruby carving, ensures this necklace is a timeless heirloom piece, passed down through generations. A true statement piece that is both elegant and eye-catching.
